history.proof: intros r ts v s. unfold substituteFormula, atomic, substituteTerms. simpl. reflexivity.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
var: nat -> fol.Term L
apply: forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L
equal: fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
atomic: forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L
impH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
notH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
forallH: nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
lt_depth: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop

Goal:
forall (r : Relations L) (ts : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteFormula (atomic r ts) v s = atomic r (substituteTerms (arity L (inl r)) ts v s)

substituteFormulaForall : forall (n : nat) (f : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth b (forallH n f) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L b}) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L (forallH n f)}
substituteFormulaHelp : forall f : fol.Formula L, nat -> fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}
substituteFormulaNot : forall f : fol.Formula L, (nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L (notH f)}
substituteFormulaImpNice : forall (f g : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}), (forall q : nat * fol.Term L, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L g}, (forall q : nat * fol.Term L, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : nat * fol.Term L, substituteFormulaImp f z1 g z3 q = substituteFormulaImp f z2 g z4 q
Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> fol.Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : fol.Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n -> fol.Terms L (S n) Arguments fol.var _ _%nat_scope Arguments fol.Terms _ _%nat_scope Arguments Tcons _ _%nat_scope
Term_Terms_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Set) (P0 : nat -> Set), (nat -> P) -> (forall f0 : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0)) -> P0 (arity L (inr f0)) -> P) -> P0 0 -> (forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> P -> fol.Terms L n -> P0 n -> P0 (S n)) -> fol.Term L -> P
substituteTerm = fix substituteTerm (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct s} : fol.Term L := match s with | @fol.var _ v => if Nat.eq_dec x v then t else var v | @fol.apply _ f ts => apply f (substituteTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts x t) end with substituteTerms (n : nat) (ss : fol.Terms L n) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct ss} : fol.Terms L n := match ss in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (fol.Terms L n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil L | @Tcons _ m s ts => Tcons L m (substituteTerm s x t) (substituteTerms m ts x t) end for substituteTerm : fol.Term L -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Term L Arguments substituteTerm _ _%nat_scope
Term_Terms_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
fol.equal : forall L : Language, fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L

```coq
intros r ts v s. unfold substituteFormula, atomic, substituteTerms. simpl. reflexivity.
Qed.```
